Question: Partitalia srl CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Partitalia Srl

Ecosense SmartBin Pro

- Utilizes IoT and RFID technologies for smart waste management
- Features advanced sensor technology to measure fill level and estimate waste generated
- Allows monitoring of waste delivery and collection status through a dedicated web app
- Incorporates an electronic lock for authorized access and PAYT pricing
- Also introducing "Discovery Mobile," a portable device for tracking waste collection data
Summary_cn:
Partitalia有限公司

Ecosense智能垃圾箱Pro

- 利用物联网和RFID技术实现智能垃圾管理
- 采用先进的传感器技术测量垃圾填充程度和估算产生的废物
- 通过专用的网络应用程序监控垃圾投放和收集状态
- 配备电子锁，用于授权访问和按量付费定价
- 还推出"Discovery Mobile"，一种便携设备，用于追踪垃圾收集数据
